low.title: Web service - Front service
low.subtitle: Configure your web service facing your clients

SERVER_NAME.help: List of the virtual hosts served by bunkerweb.
SERVER_NAME.label: Server name
SERVER_NAME.name: Server name

popovers.text: List of the virtual hosts served by bunkerweb.

USE_LETS_ENCRYPT_STAGING.help: Use the staging environment for Let’s Encrypt certificate generation. Useful when you are testing your deployments to avoid being rate limited in the production environment.
USE_LETS_ENCRYPT_STAGING.label: Use Let's Encrypt Staging
USE_LETS_ENCRYPT_STAGING.name: Use Let's Encrypt Staging

popovers.text: Use the staging environment for Let’s Encrypt certificate generation. Useful when you are testing your deployments to avoid being rate limited in the production environment.

low.title: Web service - Upstream server
low.subtitle: Configure the upstream server to be protected by BunkerWeb

REVERSE_PROXY_HOST.help: Full URL of the proxied resource (proxy_pass).
REVERSE_PROXY_HOST.label: Reverse proxy host
REVERSE_PROXY_HOST.name: Reverse proxy host

popovers.text: Full URL of the proxied resource (proxy_pass).

REVERSE_PROXY_URL.help: Location URL that will be proxied.
REVERSE_PROXY_URL.label: Reverse proxy url
REVERSE_PROXY_URL.name: Reverse proxy url

popovers.text: Location URL that will be proxied.

REVERSE_PROXY_CUSTOM_HOST.help: Override Host header sent to upstream server.
REVERSE_PROXY_CUSTOM_HOST.label: Reverse proxy custom host
REVERSE_PROXY_CUSTOM_HOST.name: Reverse proxy custom host

popovers.text: Override Host header sent to upstream server.

REVERSE_PROXY_WS.help: Enable websocket on the proxied resource.
REVERSE_PROXY_WS.label: Reverse proxy WS
REVERSE_PROXY_WS.name: Reverse proxy WS

popovers.text: Enable websocket on the proxied resource.

REVERSE_PROXY_KEEPALIVE.help: Enable or disable keepalive connections with the proxied resource.
REVERSE_PROXY_KEEPALIVE.label: Reverse proxy keepalive
REVERSE_PROXY_KEEPALIVE.name: Reverse proxy keepalive

popovers.text: Enable or disable keepalive connections with the proxied resource.

low.title: HTTP - General
low.subtitle: Configure the settings related to the HTTP(S) protocol

ALLOWED_METHODS.help: Allowed HTTP and WebDAV methods, separated with pipes to be sent by clients.
ALLOWED_METHODS.label: Allowed methods
ALLOWED_METHODS.name: Allowed methods

popovers.text: Allowed HTTP and WebDAV methods, separated with pipes to be sent by clients.

HTTP2.help: Support HTTP2 protocol when HTTPS is enabled.
HTTP2.label: HTTP2
HTTP2.name: HTTP2

popovers.text: Support HTTP2 protocol when HTTPS is enabled.

HTTP3.help: Support HTTP3 protocol when HTTPS is enabled.
HTTP3.label: HTTP3
HTTP3.name: HTTP3

popovers.text: Support HTTP3 protocol when HTTPS is enabled.

SSL_PROTOCOLS.help: The supported version of TLS. We recommend the default value TLSv1.2 TLSv1.3 for compatibility reasons.
SSL_PROTOCOLS.label: HTTPS protocols
SSL_PROTOCOLS.name: HTTPS protocols

popovers.text: The supported version of TLS. We recommend the default value TLSv1.2 TLSv1.3 for compatibility reasons.

low.title: HTTP - Headers
low.subtitle: Configure the settings related to the HTTP headers

COOKIE_FLAGS.help: Cookie flags automatically added to all cookies (value accepted for nginx_cookie_flag_module).
COOKIE_FLAGS.label: Cookie flags
COOKIE_FLAGS.name: Cookie flags

popovers.text: Cookie flags automatically added to all cookies (value accepted for nginx_cookie_flag_module).

KEEP_UPSTREAM_HEADERS.help: Headers to keep from upstream (Header1 Header2 Header3 ... or * for all).
KEEP_UPSTREAM_HEADERS.label: Keep upstream headers
KEEP_UPSTREAM_HEADERS.name: Keep upstream headers

popovers.text: Headers to keep from upstream (Header1 Header2 Header3 ... or * for all).

CORS_ALLOW_ORIGIN.help: Allowed origins to make CORS requests : PCRE regex or *.
CORS_ALLOW_ORIGIN.label: Allowed origins
CORS_ALLOW_ORIGIN.name: Allowed origins

popovers.text: Allowed origins to make CORS requests : PCRE regex or *.

low.title: Security - Bad behavior
low.subtitle: Configure the settings related to the automatic ban when a bad behavior is detected.

BAD_BEHAVIOR_STATUS_CODES.help: List of HTTP status codes considered as 'bad'.
BAD_BEHAVIOR_STATUS_CODES.label: Bad status codes
BAD_BEHAVIOR_STATUS_CODES.name: Bad status codes

popovers.text: List of HTTP status codes considered as 'bad'.

BAD_BEHAVIOR_BAN_TIME.help: The duration time (in seconds) of a ban when the corresponding IP has reached the threshold.
BAD_BEHAVIOR_BAN_TIME.label: Ban duration (in seconds)
BAD_BEHAVIOR_BAN_TIME.name: Ban duration (in seconds)

popovers.text: The duration time (in seconds) of a ban when the corresponding IP has reached the threshold.

BAD_BEHAVIOR_THRESHOLD.help: Maximum number of 'bad' HTTP status codes within the period of time before IP is banned.
BAD_BEHAVIOR_THRESHOLD.label: Threshold
BAD_BEHAVIOR_THRESHOLD.name: Threshold

popovers.text: Maximum number of 'bad' HTTP status codes within the period of time before IP is banned.

BAD_BEHAVIOR_COUNT_TIME.help: Period of time (in seconds) during which we count 'bad' HTTP status codes.
BAD_BEHAVIOR_COUNT_TIME.label: Period (in seconds)
BAD_BEHAVIOR_COUNT_TIME.name: Period (in seconds)

popovers.text: Period of time (in seconds) during which we count 'bad' HTTP status codes.

low.title: Security - Blacklisting
low.subtitle: Configure the settings related to the external blacklists.

low.title: Security - Limiting
low.subtitle: Configure the settings related to limiting requests and connections.

LIMIT_CONN_MAX_HTTP1.help: Maximum number of connections per IP when using HTTP/1.X protocol.
LIMIT_CONN_MAX_HTTP1.label: Maximum number of HTTP/1.X connections
LIMIT_CONN_MAX_HTTP1.name: Maximum number of HTTP/1.X connections

popovers.text: Maximum number of connections per IP when using HTTP/1.X protocol.

LIMIT_CONN_MAX_HTTP2.help: Maximum number of streams per IP when using HTTP/2 protocol.
LIMIT_CONN_MAX_HTTP2.label: Maximum number of HTTP/2 streams
LIMIT_CONN_MAX_HTTP2.name: Maximum number of HTTP/2 streams

popovers.text: Maximum number of streams per IP when using HTTP/2 protocol.

LIMIT_REQ_URL.help: URL (PCRE regex) where the limit request will be applied or special value / for all requests.
LIMIT_REQ_URL.label: Limit request URL
LIMIT_REQ_URL.name: Limit request URL

popovers.text: URL (PCRE regex) where the limit request will be applied or special value / for all requests.

LIMIT_REQ_RATE.help: Rate to apply to the URL (s for second, m for minute, h for hour and d for day).
LIMIT_REQ_RATE.label: Limit request Rate
LIMIT_REQ_RATE.name: Limit request Rate

popovers.text: Rate to apply to the URL (s for second, m for minute, h for hour and d for day).

low.title: Security - Antibot
low.subtitle: Configure the settings about bot detection

ANTIBOT_URI.help: Unused URI that clients will be redirected to to solve the challenge.
ANTIBOT_URI.label: Antibot URL
ANTIBOT_URI.name: Antibot URL

popovers.text: Unused URI that clients will be redirected to to solve the challenge.

ANTIBOT_RECAPTCHA_SCORE.help: Minimum score required for reCAPTCHA challenge.
ANTIBOT_RECAPTCHA_SCORE.label: reCAPTCHA score
ANTIBOT_RECAPTCHA_SCORE.name: reCAPTCHA score

popovers.text: Minimum score required for reCAPTCHA challenge.
